comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create an MS SQL Server 2000 db driver
2.Define a connection profile to access a MS SQL Server DB on localhost (like the sample db Northwind)
3.Try to connect to it and browse it


More information:
I am running DTP 1.5 on Eclipse 3.3.
I defined a database connection profile.
A few times, I got the error below.
FYI, here is my JDBC connection URL:
jdbc:microsoft:sqlserver://localhost:1433;databaseName=Vaultus800

eclipse.buildId=I20070625-1500
java.version=1.5.0_11
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -vm C:\Java\jdk1.5.0_11\jre\bin\javaw.exe
Command-line arguments:  -data C:\Documents and 
Settings\cdoucette\Eclipse\new\workspace-trunk -os win32 -ws win32 -arch 
x86 -vm C:\Java\jdk1.5.0_11\jre\bin\javaw.exe

I set the target to Ganemede, but please fix this in 15.1 if possible.

Removed the error log. Since the default ServerIdentifier can't handle all types of url, there's no need to report the error. As a complete solution to this problem, a ServerIdentifier for MSSQL should be contributed into sql editor framework. Please reference SQLDevToolsConfiguration & DBHelper.
